    Package index

    scMultiMap functions

    Functions for inferring cell-type-specific peak-gene associations

    scMultiMap()
    scMultiMap
    scMultiMap_WLS_by_gene()
    WLS utility function.
    scMultiMap_WLS()
    Weighted least squares (WLS) in scMultiMap
    scMultiMap_IRLS()
    Iteratively reweighted least squares (IRLS) in scMultiMap
    get_top_peak_gene_pairs()
    get_top_peak_gene_pairs

    Supporting toy data sets

    Data sets for illustrative purposes

    small_obj
    A small pedagogical Seurat object
    small_pairs_df
    A data frame of peak-gene pairs, to be used with small_obj
    small_irls_list
    A toy example of estimated results from scMultiMap_IRLS() on small_obj.
    example_pair
    A simulated independent peak-gene pair
    example_pair_bsample
    A simulated perfectly correlated peak-gene pair with multiple biological samples present
